metadata.title: CVE-2024-27073 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: ttpci: fix two memleaks in budget_av_attachWhen saa7146_register_device and saa7146_vv_init fails, budget_av_attachshould free the resources it allocates, like the error-handling ofttpci_budget_init does. Besides, there are two fixme comment refers tosuch deallocations.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
